summary: This document contains an email exchange regarding the identification of a specific item, described as a 'Jelly Anal Wand'. A detective from the Palm Beach Police Department seeks assistance in identifying the item, which is believed to be sold in local sex shops. The correspondence includes product details and a reference to a specific online store.

persons.name: John F.
persons.context: John F. provides his opinion on the identification of a specific item in response to a request from a detective.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: The detective from the Palm Beach Police Department is seeking assistance in identifying an item related to an ongoing case.

keyFacts: John F. believes the item in question is a Jelly Anal Wand.
The item is suggested to be available at sex shops on Commercial Blvd in Fort Lauderdale.
The detective is working on a case that requires identifying the item.
The document includes references to product specifications and an online store selling similar items.
